text: Hagi ana zupage Josua'a Makida rankumara hara hu zamagtereno kini ne'zamine ana maka vahera kazinteti zamahe fri vagare'ne. Ana kumapina mago'zane huno otreno ana maka'zana eri haviza nehuno, mago vahera atregeno omani'ne. Hagi Jeriko kini ne'ma hunte'neaza huno, Makida kumate kini nera ana zanke hunte'ne.
